choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, or cashews
Sure, here is one sample menu that meets your dietary restrictions : 
 - Breakfast (1 serving): 1 cup of oatmeal with blueberries and walnuts; 2 cups of coffee.  
- Lunch (2 servings): Grilled chicken breast sandwich on whole wheat bread with lettuce, tomato, onion ; small green salad. 
- Snack (1 serving) : 1 apple. 
 - Dinner (3 servings): Sautéed zucchini and mushrooms in olive oil; baked potato wedges seasoned with salt, pepper, paprika powder.  
- Snack (2 servings): 2 cups of green tea. 
This menu provides a total of about 2000 calories, which is enough for an average adult male. Please note that this sample meal plan does not take into account any physical activity or individual calorie requirements - please adjust the portions as needed to meet your personal dietary and energy needs
